EmailTemplate.description: IN USE Email sent to Applicant upon rejection
EmailTemplate.name: Application Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Application {!Application__c.Name} has been rejected.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Applicant,
This is to inform you that your Application {!Application__c.Name} for Announcement has gone through the Review Process and we wish to inform that your application is not selected for award.
Please do not reply to this email. You may contact the GovGrants Support Team at govgrants@support.com if you have any questions or need assistance with this task.
Sincerely,
EGMS Team
